title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 100.7 - Special hauling permit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 100.7 - Special hauling permit

State Regulations

Authorization issued by the Thruway Authority on payment of
a prescribed fee permitting a single trip by a specific vehicle or normal
combination of vehicles which could not otherwise use the Thruway system
because of excess dimensions or weight. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
100.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
